physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Several small, nonblanching, petechial lesions on the hands and feet; four slightly raised, erythematous lesions on the hands and left lower leg; tenderness in the wrists, metacarpophalangeal joints, ankles, and metatarsophalangeal joints; pain with motion of the hips and knees; firm and tender calves.

Dry mouth and weight loss of 9 kg over 2 months; redness and mild pain in both eyes; diffuse conjunctival injection affecting the episcleral vessels; violaceous hue in the underlying sclera; swollen and firm calves, tender on palpation; pain on flexion and extension of the right great toe; erythematous papules on the left and right olecranon.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressively worsening calf pain leading to difficulty walking.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Firm and tender calves; diffuse conjunctival injection; violaceous hue of the sclera; presence of erythematous, nonblanching lesions on the lower legs and hands.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Additional findings of mild redness and violaceous hue in both eyes without blurred vision.
